question:
You are studying English at a private language school attended by many international students. You are planning a surprise birthday party for a friend who has been feeling particularly sad and homesick. Write to another classmate and invite him / her to the party.


explain the reason for the partygive the date and time of the partysuggest what the classmate could bring to the party
text: How are you? I'm writing to invite you to the surprise birthday party of Zuri. You know very well and notice that she feels lonely , always seems to be isolated and doesn't blend with others. So I'm throwing a party so she will feel better.

Let me give you the details about the party. Even though her birthday is on Sunday. It is a good idea if we will celebrate it on Saturday night from 8:00 pm onwards. The place for a meeting before we visit her dorm is in a coffee shop, then all of us will head to her flat. It will be exciting for her.

Well, Although I've already ordered a cake, we should buy a gift for her for which every one of us will contribute. So bring some cash with you If possible please get the candles and matchbox, as these are not coming with cake
I look forward to meeting you soon!
